abstract: Tech billionaire Peter Thiel defends his decision to donate $1.25 million to Donald J Trump's presidential campaign; backing of controversial candidate has raised more controversy for Thiel than revelations he funded lawsuit that ultimately shut down news site Gawker.
lead_paragraph: The tech billionaire is known for bucking convention, but his backing of Mr. Trump’s presidential bid has outraged much of Silicon Valley.
snippet: The tech billionaire is known for bucking convention, but his backing of Mr. Trump’s presidential bid has outraged much of Silicon Valley....

headline.main: Peter Thiel Defends His Most Contrarian Move Yet: Supporting Trump
headline.print_headline: Peter Thiel, Contrarian Tech Billionaire, Defends His Support of Trump
